CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 015EA

TI_DOC.P: FR-Paris la Défense: Solcellemoduler

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ADDRESS: Coeur Défense Tour B- 100 esplanade du Général de Gaulle

OLD.P: III.1.1) Qualification for the system:
Conditions to be fulfilled by economic operators in view of their qualification: The supplier shall comply with theconditions linked to following main points:
— financial,
— business (which includes supplier relationship and return of experience),
— capacity,
— quality,
— reference,
— technical,
— sustainable development,
— health and safety.
Methods according to which each of those conditions will be verified: The conditions will be verified on supplier'sresponses based on:
— the data and information sent by the supplier and the potential documents that the contracting entitiesalready have,
— the audit of the production plant,
— the sample module tests,
— the agreement of the quality control process which will happen after a potential purchase.
The document defining the rules of the qualification system can be obtained at the address in detailed in I.1)
The qualification process implies a financial contribution of the supplier. The amount of this contribution is fixedat 5 000 EUR per factory to which may be added, if necessary, the VAT.
A supplier can be qualified for one or more sections listed in II.3.

NEW.P: III.1.1) Qualification for the system:
Conditions to be fulfilled by economic operators in view of their qualification: The supplier shall comply with the conditions linked to following main points:
— financial,
— business (which includes supplier relationship and return of experience),
— capacity,
— quality,
— reference,
— technical,
— sustainable development,
— health and safety,
— acceptance by the supplier of an audit of its production plant,
— acceptance by the supplier of acceptance tests on sample modules,
— acceptance by the supplier of the contracting entity’s quality control process after a potential purchase.
Methods according to which each of those conditions will be verified: The conditions will be verified on supplier's responses based on:
— the data and information sent by the supplier and the potential documents that the contracting entities already have,
— the agreement of an audit of its production plant,
— the agreement of acceptance tests on sample modules,
— the agreement of the quality control process which will happen after a potential purchase.
The document defining the rules of the qualification system can be obtained at the address in detailed in I.1)
The qualification process implies a financial contribution of the supplier. The amount of this contribution is fixed at 5 000 EUR per factory to which may be added, if necessary, the VAT.
A supplier can be qualified for one or more sections listed in II.3.

In addition to above qualification conditions, the supplier shall note that a potential supply of modules can only take place provided that the production plant audit and the acceptance tests are satisfactory.

— sustainable development,
— health and safety,
— acceptance by the supplier of an audit of its production plant,
— acceptance by the supplier of acceptance tests on sample modules,
— acceptance by the supplier of the contracting entity’s quality control process after a potential purchase.
Methods according to which each of those conditions will be verified: The conditions will be verified on supplier's responses based on:
— the data and information sent by the supplier and the potential documents that the contracting entities already have,
— the agreement of an audit of its production plant,
— the agreement of acceptance tests on sample modules,
— the agreement of the quality control process which will happen after a potential purchase.
The document defining the rules of the qualification system can be obtained at the address in detailed in I.1)
The qualification process implies a financial contribution of the supplier. The amount of this contribution is fixed at 5 000 EUR per factory to which may be added, if necessary, the VAT.
A supplier can be qualified for one or more sections listed in II.3.

In addition to above qualification conditions, the supplier shall note that a potential supply of modules can only take place provided that the production plant audit and the acceptance tests are satisfactory.

NEW.P: III.1.1) Qualification for the system:
Conditions to be fulfilled by economic operators in view of their qualification: The supplier shall comply with the conditions linked to following main points:
— financial,
— business (which includes supplier relationship and return of experience),
— capacity,
— quality,
— reference,
— technical,
— sustainable development,
— health and safety,
— acceptance by the supplier of an audit of its production plant,
— acceptance by the supplier of acceptance tests on sample modules,
— acceptance by the supplier of the contracting entity’s quality control process after a potential purchase.
Methods according to which each of those conditions will be verified: The conditions will be verified on supplier's responses based on:
— the data and information sent by the supplier and the potential documents that the contracting entities already have,
— the agreement of an audit of its production plant,
— the agreement of acceptance tests on sample modules,
— the agreement of the quality control process which will happen after a potential purchase.
The document defining the rules of the qualification system can be obtained at the address in detailed in I.1)
The qualification process implies a financial contribution of the supplier. The amount of this contribution is fixed at 5 000 EUR per factory to which may be added, if necessary, the VAT.
A supplier can be qualified for one or more sections listed in II.3.

In addition to above qualification conditions, the supplier shall note that a potential supply of modules can only take place provided that the production plant audit and the acceptance tests are satisfactory.
